nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi: A Junior Novel

Star Wars: The Last Jedi: A Junior Novel is the junior novelization by Michael Kogge that adapts the events of the 2017 film of the same name. The novel was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on March 6, 2018. It contains original scenes and an eight-page full-color insert. The cover for the junior novelization is derived from the Japanese poster art for the film.

A junior novel retelling of Star Wars: The Last Jedi, with deleted and extended scenes, as well as exclusive scenes you won't find anywhere else featuring Rey, Chewbacca, R2-D2, Finn, and more! This book also includes an 8-page full-color insert.
